verbose_text: When we checked the GFP or RedStinger signals representing the expression patterns of each Activin-type ligands in adult fruit flies, we found that the larval expression patterns of Actbeta, Daw and Myo just persisted into adults with strong expression of Actbeta in mushroom body and motor neurons and Daw and Myo in glial cells (XREF_FIG A, B, C, G).
